front.title: MIME Directory Profiles for Listing Whois++ Schema

abstract.t: This document defines two MIME directory profiles [HOWE1] necessary for supporting the definition of Whois++ [FALT1] templates (schemas). It is intended for communication with the Internet schema listing service ([APPL1], [APPL2], [APPL3], [APPL4]). The profiles defined are: schema-whoispp-0 whoispp-attr-0 Also, 5 MIME directory types are defined: wpp-template-name wpp-template-desc wpp-attr-ptr wpp-attr-name wpp-attr-desc
